metadata.world_map_reference: Palworld uses a two‑dimensional coordinate system where the X axis runs east–west and the Y axis runs north–south.  Coordinates may be positive or negative.  (0,0) lies near the initial spawn area on the main island.

capture_common_pal.notes: Capturing a new species yields a significant XP bonus compared with defeating it.  NameHero’s leveling guide emphasises capturing Pals to gain XP【116860197722081†L96-L128】.

capture_rare_pal.notes: Rare or Alpha Pals award more XP (up to ~10× for Alphas).

defeat_pal.notes: Defeating a Pal gives less XP than capturing, but still contributes to leveling.

craft_item.notes: Crafting consumables or basic items yields small amounts of XP.

build_structure.notes: Building stations and structures grants XP based on complexity.

boss_clear.notes: Clearing a tower boss or dungeon provides a large XP reward.

quest_complete.notes: Completing story quests or side objectives grants XP.

routes.title: Starter Base and Capture
objectives: Gather basic resources and build a Primitive Workbench
Craft Pal Spheres and capture three different Pals

failure_penalties.hardcore: Death results in character deletion

adaptive_guidance.underleveled: Loop step :001 twice and capture Lamball first; their low aggression keeps risk minimal while still granting capture XP.
adaptive_guidance.overleveled: If you arrive above level 6, prioritize step :003 and transition directly into harness crafting to avoid redundant farming.

resource_shortages.solution: Trigger the resource-paldium subroute from step :003 or mine blue ore veins along the riverbank.
Clear Windswept Hills bushes after step :001; each bush yields 2-3 Fiber quickly.

adaptive_guidance.time_limited: Complete steps :001 through :003 only; capture a single Lamball to unlock base chores and return later for the full roster.

dynamic_rules.adjustment: Treat step :001 as maintenance only, finish :003 to restock spheres, then pivot into mount-foxparks-harness without repeating :004.
Execute steps :001 through :003 only and bank captured materials; postpone the third capture in :004 until more time is available.
Loop the river rocks north of the spawn before step :003 or trigger the resource-paldium subroute immediately.

failure_recovery.normal: If you faint, recover your dropped pouch before it despawns and resume at the nearest Fast Travel statue.
failure_recovery.hardcore: Retreat before HP reaches 25%; if a death is imminent, abandon the route and reset from the title to preserve the Hardcore save.

steps.detail: Harvest at least 20 Wood from trees and 15 Stone from boulders in the Windswept Hills.  Trees and stone nodes respawn quickly; use a primitive tool or your Pals to speed up collection.

hardcore.tactics: Avoid engaging hostile Pals while gathering; keep your HP above 50 % and carry extra berries.

role_splits.tasks: Watch for aggressive Pals and keep area clear

steps.detail: Open the construction menu and build a Primitive Workbench using 2 Wood【907636800064548†screenshot】.  Place it near your gathering area.

Use the Primitive Workbench to craft at least five Pal Spheres.  Each sphere requires Paldium Fragments (gathered from blue ore) and a small amount of Wood and Stone.  If you lack fragments, mine Paldium nodes along the river.

Throw Pal Spheres at Lamball, Cattiva, Chikipi, Lifmunk or Foxparks in the Windswept Hills【956200907149478†L146-L169】.  Approach from behind to improve your catch rate.  Capturing new species grants more XP than defeating them【116860197722081†L96-L128】.

hardcore.tactics: Avoid aggroing the nearby Mammorest boss while hunting【956200907149478†L146-L169】.  Always keep a healing item ready.

role_splits.tasks: Aggro the Pal and kite it

coop.loot_rules: Each player keeps one captured Pal

steps.detail: Gather extra Wood and build a basic shelter to protect yourself and your newly captured Pals.  A roof prevents rain damage and increases comfort.

steps.summary: Register your starter base with the Investigator board
steps.detail: Visit the Investigator board in the Small Settlement to hand in the "First Settlement" request. This unlocks the story tracker and marks your base as recognised.

next_routes.reason: Gather materials for future gear
You captured Foxparks and can now craft its harness

routes.title: Leather Farming Loop (Early)
objectives: Acquire the required quantity of Leather

failure_penalties.hardcore: Death results in permaloss of captured Pals

adaptive_guidance.underleveled: Target Lamball and Vixy groups on the outskirts of Windswept Hills until level 6 before rotating to Sea Breeze.
adaptive_guidance.overleveled: Hunt Direhowl packs in the ravine for faster drops; their higher HP scales with your damage output.

resource_shortages.solution: Craft a fresh batch at your Primitive Workbench before departing.
Sell spare ores or berries at the Archipelago merchant to fund purchases.

adaptive_guidance.time_limited: Clear step :001 then buy the remainder from the merchant in step :003 to finish within five minutes.

dynamic_rules.adjustment: Prioritise the merchant purchase in step :003 before engaging the densest spawn clusters in :002 to minimise death risk.
Run the Sea Breeze loop in :002 twice—first clockwise around the Church, then along the Bridge of the Twin Knights—to stock 20+ Leather in one outing.
Stay until you bank at least 15 Leather so upcoming saddle routes such as mount-eikthyrdeer-saddle do not immediately reinsert this farm.

benefits: Unlocks fast travel point if activated

failure_recovery.normal: If downed, respawn at the nearest statue and retrieve your pouch; mobs here do not despawn quickly.
failure_recovery.hardcore: Disengage if two hostile spawns overlap; kite towards coastlines where line-of-sight breaks make escapes safer.

steps.detail: Head to the Sea Breeze Archipelago Church or the Bridge of the Twin Knights.  These areas host large numbers of Foxparks, Rushoars and Fuacks, which all drop Leather【840767909995613†L78-L100】【840767909995613†L106-L135】.

Defeat or capture Foxparks, Fuack, Rushoar, Melpaca, Vixy, Eikthyrdeer and Direhowl.  Each drop guarantees 1–3 Leather【142053078936299†L295-L311】【840767909995613†L49-L103】.  Use water Pals against fire types and electric Pals against water types.  Expect roughly 10–20 Leather/hour when solo and 20–30 Leather/hour in Co‑Op.

hardcore.tactics: Pull one Pal at a time and use ranged attacks to minimise damage

role_splits.tasks: Collect drops and watch for respawns

steps.detail: If hunting is too risky, purchase Leather from a Wandering Merchant for approximately 150 gold each【840767909995613†L78-L100】.

next_routes.reason: Provides Leather needed for Foxparks Harness
Provides Leather for Direhowl Harness
Provides Leather for Eikthyrdeer Saddle

routes.title: Paldium Fragment Mining Loop
objectives: Convert spare Ore into fragments if needed

failure_penalties.hardcore: Potential durability loss on tools

adaptive_guidance.underleveled: Equip a Stone Pickaxe and avoid Alpha spawns near the river; capture a Lifmunk to assist with mining.
adaptive_guidance.overleveled: Route through the Desiccated Desert outcrops for higher-density nodes to refill faster.

resource_shortages.solution: Craft a backup Stone Pickaxe at the Workbench before leaving base.
Crush Ore at the Primitive Furnace for 2 fragments per ingot batch.

adaptive_guidance.time_limited: Mine the waterfall circuit (step :001) once, then smelt spare Ore into fragments back at base.

dynamic_rules.adjustment: Run only step :001 and convert any Ore you already own via :003 on return to base for a quick 30+ fragment top-up.
Chain steps :001 and :002 without travel breaks, then immediately queue Ore smelting in :003 to push past 60 fragments before leaving the valley.
Assign one player to ferry Ore back to the furnace after step :002 while the miner keeps nodes cycling, preventing respawn downtime.

failure_recovery.normal: If your tool breaks, fast travel home, craft a replacement and resume from the last checkpoint.
failure_recovery.hardcore: Avoid fighting while encumbered; drop excess stone before sprinting back to safety.

steps.detail: Follow the river south of the Windswept Hills fast travel statue.  Blue crystalline nodes respawn every few minutes and yield 2–4 fragments each【palwiki-paldium†L42-L71】.

hardcore.tactics: Keep stamina above 50 % to dodge hostile Lamballs

steps.detail: Circle the cliff ring northwest of the starting valley.  Surface fragments protrude from the ground and can be kicked for bonus drops, netting ~30 fragments per lap【palwiki-paldium†L86-L115】.

Back at base, smelt spare Ore into Ingots, then crush the leftovers to convert into extra fragments.  Each smelting cycle produces 2 fragments as a by-product when using the Primitive Furnace【palwiki-paldium†L118-L140】.

next_routes.reason: Paldium needed for harness crafting
Supplies fragments for the tech

routes.title: Pal Fluid Condenser
objectives: Assign fluid workers or cull for stock

failure_penalties.normal: Aggressive patrols near the shoreline can down you; respawning costs travel time.
failure_penalties.hardcore: Hardcore runs should avoid cliff combat—fall damage while hauling fluids can be lethal.

adaptive_guidance.underleveled: Capture only Pengullet during daylight and avoid the deeper coves where Syndicate scouts roam.【palwiki-pengullet-fandom†L1868-L1872】
adaptive_guidance.overleveled: Chain Pengullet and Fuack loops without returning to base, filling storage with 30+ Pal Fluids per run.【palwiki-pengullet†L575-L619】【palwiki-fuack†L1667-L1667】

resource_shortages.solution: Craft surplus Pal Spheres so you can safely capture both species without crafting breaks.

adaptive_guidance.time_limited: Complete step :001 only for a quick 10 Pal Fluid top-up, then let ranch assignments produce more while you log off.

dynamic_rules.adjustment: Have one player capture while the other ferries extras back to base to keep spawn timers rolling.

failure_recovery.normal: If you fall or faint on the cliffs, fast travel back to the coastline statue and resume from the last cleared cove.
failure_recovery.hardcore: Retreat before nightfall; Hardcore players should avoid fighting Penking patrols until geared.

steps.summary: Sweep the Windswept shoreline for Pengullet
steps.detail: Follow the beach east of the Windswept Hills fast travel point. Pengullet congregate along the water, drop Pal Fluids on capture, and offer Watering utility for your base.【palwiki-pengullet-fandom†L1868-L1872】【palwiki-pengullet†L575-L619】

hardcore.tactics: Use ranged attacks from the cliffs to soften Pengullet before throwing spheres to avoid retaliation.

steps.detail: Cut inland to the freshwater pools west of the plateau. Fuack roam around water sources, drop Pal Fluids alongside Leather, and bolster your Watering roster.【palwiki-fuack†L1853-L1859】【palwiki-fuack†L1667-L1667】

steps.summary: Assign fluid workers or bottle extras
steps.detail: Back at base, station Pengullet or Fuack on Watering posts or cooking stations, then butcher surplus captures for additional Pal Fluids to feed polymer and medicine recipes.【palwiki-pengullet†L575-L619】【palwiki-fuack†L1667-L1667】

next_routes.reason: Pal Fluids feed polymer and circuit recipes in the mid-game expansion arc.

routes.title: Egg Clutch Run
objectives: Sweep the meadow for loose eggs

failure_penalties.normal: Minimal—Chikipi flee rather than fight, so only time is lost.
failure_penalties.hardcore: Hardcore runs risk a stray patrol near the fields; keep distance if undergeared.

adaptive_guidance.underleveled: Stay near the Palbox outskirts and capture one Chikipi at a time to avoid chain aggro.【palwiki-chikipi†L1850-L1857】
adaptive_guidance.overleveled: Run the route twice per outing, filling both ranch slots and stockpiling 15+ Eggs for breeding queues.【palwiki-chikipi†L1667-L1693】

resource_shortages.solution: Bring at least five Pal Spheres so you can secure a full ranch roster without returning mid-loop.

adaptive_guidance.time_limited: Catch two Chikipi in step :001, assign them during :002, and let passive production cover the deficit until you revisit.

dynamic_rules.adjustment: Hold an extra Chikipi in your party after step :002 so you can rotate fresh layers into the ranch as timers cool down.

failure_recovery.normal: If a Chikipi faints, fast travel back to the Hills statue and repeat step :001—respawns are fast.
failure_recovery.hardcore: Avoid combat entirely; sprint away from patrols rather than risking a Hardcore wipe for a single egg.

steps.detail: Circle the grassy flats below the Palbox. Chikipi roam here constantly, lay eggs on the ground, and rarely fight back, so you can secure four layers quickly.【palwiki-chikipi†L1850-L1859】

role_splits.tasks: Grab ground eggs and throw Pal Spheres

steps.detail: Place two captured Chikipi on the Ranch. Their Egg Layer partner skill produces eggs over time, so stagger assignments to keep timers rolling.【palwiki-chikipi†L1667-L1693】

steps.summary: Scoop loose eggs while timers reset
steps.detail: Jog a perimeter lap through the same fields, collecting freshly laid eggs and watching for respawned Chikipi to top off your ranch roster.【palwiki-chikipi†L1850-L1859】

next_routes.reason: Pair eggs with Honey to bake Cake for breeding.

routes.title: Wool Ranch Loop
objectives: Assign ranch hands and spool cloth

failure_penalties.normal: Losing the herd only costs a few Pal Spheres and a short jog.
failure_penalties.hardcore: Hardcore runs risk sacrificing early ranch workers; keep stamina high when kiting hostile patrols.

adaptive_guidance.underleveled: Stick to the Windswept Hills meadows and capture docile Lamball pairs until you can safely travel to Sea Breeze.【palwiki-lamball†L620-L623】【goleap-region-levels†L131-L147】
adaptive_guidance.overleveled: Chain both regions in a single loop, hauling 25+ Wool before returning to base for tailoring queues.【palwiki-lamball†L620-L623】

resource_shortages.solution: Craft extra Pal Spheres at the Primitive Workbench before leaving; you will need at least six to refresh ranch slots.

adaptive_guidance.time_limited: Complete step :001 only, then assign one Lamball to the ranch for passive Wool until you can finish the loop.

dynamic_rules.adjustment: Split duties—one player lassos Lamball while the other clears respawn timers and escorts captives back to base.
Assign two Lamball to separate ranch slots after step :003 to double passive production and queue cloth crafting immediately.

failure_recovery.normal: If Lamball faint en route, fast travel back to the Windswept Hills statue and repeat step :001 with fresh Pal Spheres.
failure_recovery.hardcore: Drop excess cargo before kiting hostile patrols; sprinting empty-handed keeps Hardcore characters safer while escorting Lamball.

steps.summary: Net Lamball herds in Windswept Hills
steps.detail: Teleport to the Windswept Hills statue and sweep the meadows south of the plateau. Lamball spawn here in friendly pairs and drop 1–3 Wool per capture, letting you recruit three ranch hands quickly.【palwiki-lamball†L575-L623】【goleap-region-levels†L131-L147】

hardcore.tactics: Keep distance from Syndicate patrols and use ranged damage to soften Lamball before throwing Pal Spheres.

role_splits.tasks: Throw Pal Spheres and haul captures

coop.loot_rules: Share Wool evenly to keep tailoring supplied

steps.summary: Rotate through Sea Breeze Archipelago pastures
steps.detail: Sail or glide to the Sea Breeze Archipelago and loop the coastal fields north of the Church. Lamball spawn here at similar levels, ensuring replacement workers and extra Wool for crafting stock.【palwiki-lamball†L620-L623】

steps.summary: Staff the ranch and weave cloth
steps.detail: Back at base, assign two Lamball to the Ranch so they passively generate Wool, then queue Cloth recipes at the workbench for early armor upgrades.【palwiki-lamball†L433-L623】

next_routes.reason: Cloth and Wool keep the mid-game expansion upgrades rolling.
Cake production needs steady Wool alongside Honey and Eggs.

routes.title: Honey Harvest Network
objectives: Secure a steady honey supply at your ranch

failure_penalties.normal: Respawn runs from Mossanda Forest take several minutes if you faint.
failure_penalties.hardcore: Level 30 patrols around Mossanda Forest can one-shot undergeared players.

adaptive_guidance.underleveled: Stay near Cinnamoth Forest (-74,-279) and net 6+ honey from level 18 Cinnamoth before approaching Mossanda Forest Pals.【pcgamesn-honey†L135-L144】
adaptive_guidance.overleveled: Chain Cinnamoth and Mossanda loops without fast travel to restock 20+ honey in a single outing.【pcgamesn-honey†L135-L145】

resource_shortages.solution: Craft extra Pal Spheres at base before hunting to avoid running dry mid-loop.

adaptive_guidance.time_limited: Clear only the Cinnamoth loop (step :001) for a quick honey top-up, then assign your best Beegarde at base.

dynamic_rules.adjustment: Split roles—one player kites and weakens targets while the other nets captures and hauls honey.
Capture two extra Beegarde in step :002 and immediately assign them to a spare ranch slot to double passive output.

failure_recovery.normal: Fast travel back to Mossanda Forest, retrieve your pouch, and resume from the last cleared spawn loop.
failure_recovery.hardcore: If a death drops gear in Mossanda Forest, regroup at base, craft heat/cold protection, and recover with a co-op buddy if possible.

steps.detail: Teleport to Cinnamoth Forest (-74,-279) north of the Bridge of the Twin Knights. The level ~18 Cinnamoth here drop Honey when captured or defeated, letting you stock 6–8 units quickly.【pcgamesn-honey†L135-L144】

hardcore.tactics: Use ranged attacks to whittle Cinnamoth before capture and dodge their powder gusts.

steps.detail: Travel to Mossanda Forest (234,-118). Level 20–30 Beegarde spawn in groups and reliably drop Honey; capture two or three to staff your ranch and stock additional drops.【pcgamesn-honey†L135-L145】

role_splits.tasks: Pull individual Beegarde and keep aggro

steps.detail: Back at base, assign captured Beegarde to a Ranch. They will periodically produce Honey without further intervention, keeping your cake pipeline stocked.【pcgamesn-honey†L146-L148】【palwiki-honey†L402-L433】

next_routes.reason: Honey enables cake production for mid-game breeding and automation.
Stockpiled honey feeds breeding loops needed before confronting Pal Genetics.

routes.title: Coal Vein Circuit
objectives: Unlock higher-yield Coal veins for Refined Ingots

failure_penalties.normal: Encumbrance slows escape from dungeon mobs; expect a long jog if you overfill your pouch.
failure_penalties.hardcore: Heat and high-level enemies in late-game regions can wipe an unprepared team, costing gear.

adaptive_guidance.underleveled: Loop the Hillside Cavern entrance nodes and reset rather than diving deep until you reach level 25.【pcgamesn-coal†L135-L138】
adaptive_guidance.overleveled: Add the Desiccated Desert ridge and Astral Mountain outcrops to clear 60+ Coal per circuit.【pcgamesn-coal†L135-L138】

resource_shortages.solution: Upgrade to a Metal Pickaxe before leaving base so Coal rocks break quickly.

adaptive_guidance.time_limited: Run only step :001 and leave once your carry weight hits 70% to avoid slowing down.

dynamic_rules.adjustment: Assign one player to mine while the partner ferries ore to a chest outside the dungeon, keeping spawns cycling.
Queue Crusher batches in :003 so spare Stone converts to Coal Fragments while you mine fresh nodes.

failure_recovery.normal: Drop excess Stone to regain stamina and kite remaining mobs back toward the entrance.
failure_recovery.hardcore: If you fall in late-game zones, retreat until you craft Heat Resistant gear before attempting recovery.

steps.detail: Enter Hillside Cavern at 147,-397 northeast of Rayne Syndicate Tower. Clear the Coal, Sulfur, and Ore clusters with a Metal Pickaxe, exiting before weight caps you.【pcgamesn-coal†L135-L138】

hardcore.tactics: Use torches to reveal ambushes and pull ranged mobs back toward the entrance hallway.

steps.detail: Once geared, push into the Desiccated Desert ridgeline (~340,-120) and Astral Mountain foothills (~40, 320) where Coal veins respawn quickly but enemies hit much harder.【pcgamesn-coal†L135-L138】

role_splits.tasks: Ping elite patrols and escort hauls

coop.loot_rules: Bank Coal in shared chests before fast travelling home

steps.detail: Back at base, feed Coal and Ore into the Improved Furnace to create Refined Ingots, or run Stone through the Crusher for extra Coal fragments.【palwiki-coal†L388-L430】

next_routes.reason: Refined Ingots power the automation upgrades in the mid-game arc.
Coal stockpiles support fire-resistant gear before tackling the Eternal Pyre.

routes.title: Sulfur Flow Loop
objectives: Unlock safe Sulfur nodes near Mossanda Forest
Establish a Mount Obsidian mining circuit

failure_penalties.normal: Heat damage and elite patrols can break gear and force long corpse runs if you overstay in lava zones.
failure_penalties.hardcore: Volcanic DoTs stack quickly; a wipe at Mount Obsidian risks permanent loss of high-tier tools and Pals.

adaptive_guidance.underleveled: Loop the Mossanda Forest ravine deposits until you can survive lava enemies deeper in Mount Obsidian.【pcgamesn-sulfur†L11-L19】
adaptive_guidance.overleveled: Base out of the Eternal Pyre entrance and rotate chest drops between runs to keep Sulfur flowing for munitions.【pcgamesn-sulfur†L15-L20】

resource_shortages.solution: Run step :003 immediately after mining so Sulfur converts into ammunition stock instead of sitting unused.【pcgamesn-sulfur†L11-L15】

adaptive_guidance.time_limited: Hit step :001 for a 10-minute top-up, then fast travel home before heat attrition sets in.

dynamic_rules.adjustment: Queue two Gunpowder batches during :003 and skip optional ore hauling so ammunition deficits clear first.
Assign one player to mine while the partner ferries ore and Sulfur back to the chest outside the Eternal Pyre entrance to keep nodes respawning.

failure_recovery.normal: Retreat to the ravine loop, repair gear, and rebuild Sulfur stock before another Mount Obsidian push.
failure_recovery.hardcore: If a Hardcore run fails, reset heat gear, recruit fresh carrying Pals, and re-enter during night when patrols thin.

steps.detail: Head northeast of the Mossanda Forest fast travel statue (234,-118) to a lava ravine with early Sulfur nodes; clear the small clusters quickly before heat and encumbrance stack up.【pcgamesn-sulfur†L13-L19】

Fast travel to the Brothers of the Eternal Pyre Tower (-588,-518), stage a chest outside, then sweep the surrounding lava flows while a Cattiva hauls ore and Sulfur back between passes.【pcgamesn-sulfur†L15-L20】【pcgamesn-bosses†L7-L9】【palwiki-sulfur†L5-L8】

role_splits.tasks: Ferry loads to the chest and reset spawns

coop.loot_rules: Deposit Sulfur in the shared chest each lap

steps.detail: Back at base, combine Sulfur with Coal at the High Quality Workbench to craft Gunpowder so ammunition production keeps pace with weapon demand.【pcgamesn-sulfur†L11-L15】【palwiki-sulfur†L5-L8】

next_routes.reason: Pure Quartz runs pair with Sulfur to advance late-game electronics.
Gunpowder reserves accelerate weapon crafting during the mid-game expansion.

routes.title: Astral Quartz Expedition
objectives: Stage a passive extraction base for circuit crafting

failure_penalties.normal: Cold damage and high-level patrols can break tools and force long retreats from Astral Mountain.
failure_penalties.hardcore: Falls or freezes near Astral Mountain wipe end-game kits; regroup with spare cold gear before returning.

adaptive_guidance.underleveled: Unlock the PAL Research Tower statue first, then run short mining bursts before elites converge.【pcgamesn-pure-quartz†L15-L20】【pcgamesn-bosses†L11-L13】
adaptive_guidance.overleveled: Claim a ridge base inside Astral Mountain so mining Pals harvest Pure Quartz passively between manual runs.【pcgamesn-pure-quartz†L19-L23】

resource_shortages.solution: Feed Pure Quartz into step :003 immediately so circuit production stays ahead of polymer demand.【pcgamesn-pure-quartz†L21-L23】

adaptive_guidance.time_limited: Fast travel in, grab two node clusters near the tower, then recall home before respawns escalate.

dynamic_rules.adjustment: Run step :003 twice and prioritize manual mining in :002 over expansion tasks until the gap clears.
One player scouts and kites patrols while the miner works nodes; swap roles every cycle to manage cold meters.

failure_recovery.normal: Return during daylight with fresh cold gear and mine lighter loads until confidence returns.
failure_recovery.hardcore: If you lose gear, restock polymer and cold armor at home before risking another Astral run.

steps.detail: Climb to the PAL Research Tower statue at roughly (-149,445) so you can fast travel straight onto the snowy slopes leading into Astral Mountain’s Pure Quartz zone.【pcgamesn-bosses†L11-L13】【pcgamesn-pure-quartz†L15-L20】

From the tower, sweep the Astral Mountain ridges for dark grey nodes with silver veins—these are Pure Quartz deposits that require durable pickaxes to break efficiently.【pcgamesn-pure-quartz†L15-L19】【palwiki-pure-quartz†L1-L3】

role_splits.tasks: Ping elite patrols and pull aggro away

coop.loot_rules: Share Quartz stacks evenly for upcoming crafts

steps.detail: Claim a base spot that includes Pure Quartz nodes and assign mining and transport Pals so the deposits respawn into storage while you craft circuit boards on-site.【pcgamesn-pure-quartz†L17-L23】

next_routes.reason: Polymer crafting consumes Pure Quartz via Circuit Boards and benefits from the Astral outpost.

routes.title: Polymer Assembly Workflow
objectives: Secure a renewable High Quality Pal Oil supply
Craft Polymer batches for weapons and circuits

failure_penalties.normal: Wasted oil and tech points slow weapon upgrades if the assembly line idles.
failure_penalties.hardcore: Losing the assembly crew in raids delays late-game gear since polymer feeds every advanced recipe.

adaptive_guidance.underleveled: Unlock the Production Assembly Line at tech level 33, then run small polymer batches until you stockpile better gear.【efa13d†L9-L13】
adaptive_guidance.overleveled: Queue long polymer runs overnight with multiple handiwork Pals so weapons and circuit boards never bottleneck.【efa13d†L9-L16】

resource_shortages.solution: Assign Dumud to a Ranch and buy extra oil from merchants before starting long assembly queues.【969e9d†L1-L8】

adaptive_guidance.time_limited: Craft two quick batches in step :003, then shut down the line to avoid burning precious oil.

dynamic_rules.adjustment: Increase batch size in :003 to 6 polymer per queue and reassign an extra handiwork Pal until the gap closes.
Have one player wrangle oil deliveries while the other cycles the assembly line UI for nonstop output.

failure_recovery.normal: Pause the line, restock oil via merchants or ranch, and resume smaller batches until supply stabilises.
failure_recovery.hardcore: Rebuild the assembly line with spare materials and rotate fresh handiwork Pals to avoid chain deaths.

steps.detail: Spend tech points at level 33 to unlock the Production Assembly Line and the Polymer recipe, then place the machine at base with power access.【efa13d†L9-L13】
Capture Dumud or other listed Pals and station them at a Ranch to generate High Quality Pal Oil, supplementing with merchant purchases as needed.【969e9d†L1-L8】

coop.loot_rules: Split oil stacks evenly before crafting

steps.detail: Load the Production Assembly Line with 2 High Quality Pal Oil per craft and assign handiwork Pals to turn the stock into Polymer for weapons and circuit boards.【efa13d†L9-L16】【99ff2c†L5-L11】

next_routes.reason: Late-game expansion arcs consume Polymer for weapons and automation upgrades.

routes.title: Recruit Base Merchant
objectives: Craft or buy high-grade Pal Spheres for human capture
Travel to the Small Settlement and separate a merchant from guards
Capture the merchant and assign them to your base

failure_penalties.normal: Knockouts drop your pouch and may cost gold if PIDF guards finish the fight.
failure_penalties.hardcore: Being executed by guards permanently ends the save—retreat if health drops below 40%.

adaptive_guidance.underleveled: If your weapons are below Iron tier, focus on trapping single merchants at night when patrols thin out before attempting the capture.
adaptive_guidance.overleveled: Players above level 18 can skip step :001 if they already stock Mega Pal Spheres and move straight to isolating the merchant.

resource_shortages.solution: Trigger resource-paldium from step :001 to restock fragments for higher-grade spheres.

adaptive_guidance.time_limited: Complete steps :001 and :002 only; mark the merchant’s position and return later with time to handle the capture.

dynamic_rules.adjustment: Have one player kite PIDF guards away during step :003 while the other drops the merchant to low HP for an easy capture.
Loop resource-paldium immediately after step :001 to craft additional high-grade spheres before confronting the merchant.

failure_recovery.normal: If guards overwhelm you, fast travel back after respawning, recover your pouch and repeat from the scouting checkpoint.

metric_usage.description: Route-level metrics reflect adaptive momentum: progress segments reward checklist depth, boss clears add large boosts, and quest nodes track story completions.

levelEstimator.estimation_method:
1. For each completed step, take the median of its XP estimate range (or the per-step range if no estimate is provided).  Sum these medians to compute the base XP.
2. Add adaptive bonuses: progress_segments × progress_segment_value, boss_targets × boss_clear_value, and quest_nodes × quest_node_value.
3. Add +500 XP for each boss clear marked directly on a step and +10% for finishing the route deathless in Hardcore.  In Co-Op, divide XP evenly among players.
4. Convert cumulative XP to a player level by finding the highest level where cumulative_xp ≤ total XP in the xp_thresholds array.
5. Compute confidence as the fraction of steps with explicit XP estimates plus 0.1 if route metrics are provided (cap at 1.0).
levelEstimator.example: Suppose a player completed the Starter Base route in solo normal mode.  The median XP for its steps sums to ~370 XP.  No bonuses apply.  According to the XP table, 370 XP corresponds to level 5.  Because all steps have explicit XP estimates, the confidence score is 1.0.

steps.instruction: Search dungeons and chests for **Life Fruits** and **Skill Fruits**.
Harvest them from special plants in rare biomes.
Use Life Fruit to heal and Skill Fruit to teach Pals new abilities.

guides.title: Harvesting Nightstar Sand
guides.trigger: Questions about special glowing sand for crafting

steps.instruction: Visit desert regions at night when **Nightstar Sand** glows.
Scoop up sand from sparkling patches.
Use it for crafting luminous items or decorations.

guides.title: Locating Meteorite & Supply Drops
guides.trigger: Player wants to find rare drops from events

steps.instruction: Watch the sky for streaking meteorites or airborne supply crates.
Head to the marked landing spot quickly; meteorites contain rare ores and supply drops hold valuable items.
Fight off enemies attracted to the drop and collect the loot.

guides.title: Collecting Eggs & Incubation
guides.trigger: When players ask about finding eggs and hatching

steps.instruction: **Find eggs** in nests, dungeons or by defeating Alpha Pals.
Place eggs in an **incubator** (or Electric Incubator for faster hatching).
Wait for the required time; monitor temperature to ensure proper incubation.

guides.title: Refreshing Vendor Stock
guides.trigger: Player asks how to refresh merchant inventory

steps.instruction: Visit a Pal Merchant or Black Marketeer.
Purchase items or sell loot.
**Leave the area**, wait for a short period, and return to refresh their stock (may also refresh after daily resets).

guides.title: Selling & Trading Items
guides.trigger: Players want to trade items or Pals for gold

steps.instruction: Collect valuable items (ores, crafted gear, rare drops).
Visit merchants or interact with other players in multiplayer.
Offer items for sale or trade in exchange for gold or other goods.

guides.title: Crafting Pal Gear & Saddles
guides.trigger: When players need gear specific to each Pal

steps.instruction: Unlock the specific **Pal gear** (e.g., Jetragon saddle) in the tech tree.
Collect required materials (leather, ingots, cloth).
Craft the gear at a **Pal gear station** and equip your Pal to use it.

guides.title: Crafting Weapons: Crossbows, Bows & Guns
guides.trigger: Player asks about available weapons and recipes

steps.instruction: Unlock the appropriate weapon blueprint.
Collect materials (wood, ingots, sulfur, polymer).
Craft the weapon at a workbench or weapon station and equip it.

guides.title: Crafting Heavy Weapons: Rocket Launcher, Minigun
guides.source_heading: Crafting Heavy Weapons: Rocket Launcher, Minigun
guides.trigger: When players want high-damage weapons

steps.instruction: Reach the required tech level and unlock the heavy weapon blueprint.
Gather advanced materials (refined metal, high-quality oil, electronics).
Craft at an advanced weapon bench and stock up on ammunition.

guides.title: Building a Glider & Upgrades
guides.trigger: Player wants to glide or travel faster

steps.instruction: Unlock glider technology in the tech tree.
Collect cloth, leather and Paldium.
Craft the glider at a workbench and equip it; upgrade with better materials for improved flight.

guides.title: Crafting Lockpicking Tools (v1-v3)
guides.trigger: Player needs to open locked chests

steps.instruction: Unlock the **Lockpicking tool** technology (requires progression in Sakurajima update).
Gather Pal Metal Ingots, Paldium Fragments and Nails.
Craft the tool at a workbench; use it to open locked treasure chests.

guides.title: Creating Armor: Cold/Heat-Resistant, Refinement
guides.trigger: Questions about protective armor sets

steps.instruction: Unlock the desired armor blueprint.
Collect hide, fur, cloth and metal plates.
Craft at the armor workbench and equip before entering extreme environments.

guides.title: Making Accessory Slots & Accessories
guides.trigger: Player wants extra accessory slots or rings

steps.instruction: Unlock accessory slot upgrades via technology.
Craft the **slot expansion** using metals and Paldium.
Craft rings or trinkets and equip them to benefit from extra bonuses.

guides.title: Building Explosives: Bombs & Grenades
guides.trigger: When players ask about demolitions or combat bombs

steps.instruction: Unlock explosive weapons in the tech tree.
Gather sulfur, charcoal (for gunpowder) and metal casings.
Craft bombs at the workbench; equip them to use in combat or mining.

guides.title: Crafting Medicine & Recovery Items
guides.trigger: Player asks how to cure sickness or injuries

steps.instruction: Unlock medicine production in the technology tree.
Gather herbs, berries and other ingredients.
Craft recovery potions or bandages at a medicine station; carry them for healing.

guides.title: Cooking & Food Recipes
guides.trigger: When players need better healing food for themselves or Pals

steps.instruction: Build a **cooking station** or campfire.
Unlock recipes using the technology tree or by experimenting with ingredients.
Combine ingredients (meat, vegetables, spices) to cook nutritious meals for you and your Pals.

guides.title: Building Transport: Airships & Boats
guides.trigger: If players ask about large mounts or vehicles

steps.instruction: Reach high tech levels to unlock airship or boat blueprints.
Gather large amounts of metal, wood and fuel.
Build at a specialized station; pilot to explore inaccessible areas.

guides.title: Crafting Taming Devices & Traps
guides.trigger: Player asks about taming rare Pals

steps.instruction: Unlock nets, traps or tranquilizer darts in the tech tree.
Gather materials (fiber, rope, tranquilizer chemicals).
Craft and place traps near rare Pals; lure them in to capture without combat.

guides.title: Creating Electric Incubators
guides.trigger: Player wants to speed up egg hatching

steps.instruction: Unlock **Electric Incubator** technology.
Collect electronics, Paldium fragments and refined metals.
Build the incubator and place eggs inside to cut hatching time in half.

guides.title: Building Fences & Pens
guides.trigger: When players need to separate Pals or livestock

steps.instruction: Unlock fence and pen structures in the build menu.
Gather wood or metal to craft them.
Place fences to enclose animals or Pals and prevent them from wandering.

guides.title: Installing Lighting & Heating
guides.trigger: Player asks about base environment comfort

steps.instruction: Unlock torches, lanterns, heaters and air conditioners.
Gather fuel or electricity sources.
Place lights and heaters in key areas of your base to improve comfort and SAN.

guides.title: Building Battery Stations & Power Infrastructure
guides.trigger: When players want to store electricity

steps.instruction: Unlock battery technology.
Collect Paldium, metals and wiring.
Build batteries near generators; connect them to store energy for night or heavy use.

guides.title: Combat Basics & Controls
guides.trigger: Player asks how to fight or dodge

steps.instruction: Familiarize yourself with **attack, block and dodge** buttons.
Lock onto enemies to maintain focus.
Practice timing dodges to avoid damage and counterattack.

guides.title: Element Types & STAB Explained
guides.trigger: When players need to understand element matchups

steps.instruction: Learn each Pal’s **element type** (Fire, Water, Grass, Electric, etc.).
Use element advantages (Water vs Fire, etc.) to deal extra damage.
Equip Pals with moves matching their element to gain **STAB** (Same Type Attack Bonus).

guides.title: Status Conditions & Cures
guides.trigger: Player asks about burns, freezes, poison etc.

steps.instruction: Understand status effects: Burn, Freeze, Poison, Sleep and Stun.
Carry **antidotes or status-removing items** crafted at medicine stations.
Swap Pals or retreat if status effects accumulate.

guides.title: How to Use Melee Weapons
guides.trigger: When players ask about swords, spears and clubs

steps.instruction: Equip a melee weapon such as a sword or spear.
Use **heavy and light attacks** to chain combos.
Block or dodge before counter-attacking to avoid damage.

guides.title: How to Use Ranged Weapons
guides.trigger: Player asks about firearms or bows

steps.instruction: Equip a bow, crossbow or firearm.
Use **aim mode** to line up your shot; account for projectile drop.
Reload when safe and switch to melee if enemies get too close.

guides.title: Tower Boss: Zoe & Grizzbolt
guides.trigger: When players need strategy for first tower

steps.instruction: Prepare by leveling your character and capturing strong Fire/Electric Pals.
Enter the first tower and fight through waves of minions.
Focus on Grizzbolt’s weak points, dodge its attacks and use Water-type moves to win.

guides.title: Tower Boss: Lily & Lyleen
guides.trigger: Player asks about second tower fight

steps.instruction: Train Pals with high Defense and Fire moves.
Progress through the second tower and avoid environmental hazards.
Burn down Lyleen’s plant-type minions and stagger the boss to defeat it.

guides.title: Tower Boss: Axel & Orserk
guides.trigger: Triggered when facing third tower

steps.instruction: Capture Ice or Grass Pals to counter Orserk’s Dragon/Electric typing.
Dodge Axel’s long-range attacks and close the distance quickly.
Focus your Pals’ partner skills and heal frequently.

guides.title: Tower Boss: Victor & Shadowbeak
guides.trigger: Player wants to defeat final tower boss

steps.instruction: Assemble a team of Dark and Ice Pals to exploit weaknesses.
Avoid Victor’s high-damage projectiles and stay mobile.
Burst Shadowbeak down during openings and use healing items.

guides.title: Raids: Xenolord & Blazamut Ryu
guides.trigger: Player asks about raid strategies

steps.instruction: Gather a group of friends or NPC Pals; raids require multiple participants.
Equip top-tier gear and potions.
Focus on raid mechanics (e.g., avoid AoE attacks) and coordinate to stagger the boss.

guides.title: Raid: Bellanoir & Bellanoir Libero
guides.trigger: When players join seasonal raids

steps.instruction: Capture Pals with strong Electric or Ice attacks.
Break Bellanoir’s shields by focusing your attacks.
Avoid the Libero variant’s rapid strikes and maintain healing.

guides.title: Boss: Bjorn & Bastigor (Feybreak)
guides.trigger: Player needs to defeat Bjorn/Bastigor

steps.instruction: Build fire-resistant armor and high DPS Pals.
Dodge Bjorn’s area attacks; avoid standing in burning pools.
Switch to Water Pals to extinguish fires and finish off Bastigor.

guides.title: Boss: Eye of Cthulu (Terraria)
guides.trigger: Triggered by Terraria crossover event

steps.instruction: Summon the boss by interacting with the event item or finding its spawn location.
Equip ranged weapons to hit the flying boss.
Focus on dodging sweeping laser beams; attack during its vulnerability phase.

guides.title: Boss: Moon Lord Raid
guides.trigger: When players ask about Moon Lord fight

steps.instruction: Prepare by equipping the best gear and assembling a full party.
Target the Moon Lord’s hands and core; destroy each part in sequence.
Keep moving to avoid large AoE attacks; coordinate healing and damage phases.

guides.title: Predator Pal Locations & Tactics
guides.trigger: Questions about strong wandering Pals

steps.instruction: Use the interactive map to locate predator Pals (e.g., Warsect, Necromus).
Approach cautiously; predator Pals have high damage and health.
Weaken them and capture or defeat them for rare drops.

guides.title: Fighting Alpha Pals
guides.trigger: Player asks how to defeat alpha versions

steps.instruction: Observe Alpha Pals roaming the world; they are larger and more aggressive.
Bring a team of complementary Pals to exploit their weaknesses.
Use traps or stun items to make capturing easier.

guides.title: PVP Combat & Arena
guides.trigger: Questions about PVP arenas and rules

steps.instruction: Visit the **PVP Arena** and register for a match.
Equip balanced gear and select Pals suited to player vs player combat.
Learn opponent patterns and adapt; remember that some moves have long wind-ups.

guides.title: Best Pals for Combat
guides.trigger: Player wants recommended combat Pals

steps.instruction: Refer to the Best Pals Tier List; top combat Pals include **Jormuntide Ignis**, **Jetragon** and **Frostallion**.
Capture or breed these Pals; level them and teach powerful skills.
Equip them with appropriate gear and upgrade passive skills via breeding.

guides.title: Best Weapons & Loadouts
guides.trigger: When players ask about the strongest weapons

steps.instruction: Craft or obtain top-tier weapons (e.g., rocket launcher, AK-like rifles).
Combine weapons with gear that enhances attack power or stamina.
Keep a melee back-up weapon for enemies resistant to bullets.

guides.title: Managing Stamina & Dodging
guides.trigger: Player complains about low stamina in battle

steps.instruction: Increase your **Stamina stat** when leveling up.
Use stamina-conserving movement (sprinting only when necessary).
Roll or dodge at the last moment to avoid attacks without wasting stamina.

guides.title: Breaking Enemy Shields & Armor
guides.trigger: Questions about dealing with armored foes

steps.instruction: Use **heavy attacks** or explosive weapons to break shields quickly.
Focus attacks on shield emitters or armored plates.
Switch to fast weapons once the shield is broken to maximize damage.

guides.title: Crowd Control & AoE Strategies
guides.trigger: When facing multiple enemies

steps.instruction: Equip Pals or weapons with **area-of-effect** skills (e.g., Tri-Lightning or Fireball).
Lure groups of enemies together and unleash AoE attacks.
Control the battlefield by slowing or stunning large groups.

guides.title: Base Defense Against Raids
guides.trigger: Player asks how to protect base during raids

steps.instruction: Build walls, turrets and traps around your base.
Assign combat-capable Pals to guard duty.
When a raid starts, lure enemies into chokepoints and defeat them with traps and Pals.

guides.title: How to Capture Pals
guides.trigger: Player asks general question about capturing

steps.instruction: Craft **Pal Spheres** and track down the desired Pal.
Reduce the Pal’s health without defeating it.
Throw the Pal Sphere and repeat until capture succeeds.

guides.title: Pal Sphere Tiers & Catch Rates
guides.trigger: Player needs to know differences between spheres

steps.instruction: Unlock higher-tier spheres (e.g., Giga Sphere, Ultra Sphere) via technology.
Gather rarer materials (chromite, polymer) to craft them.
Use higher-tier spheres on strong or Alpha Pals for better catch rates.

guides.title: Sneaking & Back-Attack Captures
guides.trigger: When players ask about stealth capture techniques

steps.instruction: Approach a Pal from behind while crouched.
Throw a Pal Sphere for a **back-attack bonus** that increases capture chance.
Avoid making noise or startling the Pal.

guides.title: Capturing Alpha Pals
guides.trigger: Triggered when facing alpha versions in the wild

steps.instruction: Bring high-tier Pal Spheres and healing items.
Weaken the Alpha Pal and avoid its high-damage moves.
Use traps or stun items to temporarily immobilize; throw spheres until captured.

guides.title: Capturing Specific Legendary Pals
guides.trigger: Player names a specific Pal (e.g., Jetragon)

steps.instruction: Learn the spawn location and conditions for the specific Legendary Pal (e.g., Jetragon spawns in late-game islands).
Prepare an element-appropriate team and high-tier spheres.
Engage the legendary Pal, reduce its HP and capture it.

guides.title: All Pal Locations by Region
guides.trigger: Player wants to know where to find each Pal

steps.instruction: Consult the interactive map or Palpedia for each Pal’s coordinates.
Travel to the specified region and look for the Pal during the correct time of day/weather.
Capture or defeat the Pal as needed.

guides.title: Pals by Element (Fire, Water, etc.)
guides.trigger: Player asks about element-based Pals

steps.instruction: Determine which element type you need (e.g., Water for Fire bosses).
Check the Palpedia or map for Pals of that element.
Capture multiple Pals to have backups for breeding and combat.

guides.title: Pals for Base Work (Transport & Kindling)
guides.trigger: When players ask which Pals help around the base

steps.instruction: Identify Pals with **Transporting** or **Kindling** work suitability.
Capture or breed these Pals.
Assign them to base tasks (hauling materials, lighting furnaces).

guides.title: Pals for Crafting & Handiwork
guides.trigger: Player wants to know which Pals craft items faster

steps.instruction: Capture Pals like **Anubis** or **Lunaris** that excel at handiwork.
Assign them to the workbench or crafting stations.
Provide necessary materials and monitor production.

guides.title: Pals for Mining & Lumbering
guides.trigger: Player asks which Pals mine ore or chop wood

steps.instruction: Capture Pals such as **Blazamut**, **Astegon** or **Reptyro**.
Assign them to mine ore nodes or chop trees.
Build storage near the worksite for efficient resource collection.

guides.title: Pals for Farming & Planting
guides.trigger: When players need help planting crops

steps.instruction: Acquire Pals with **Planting** suitability (e.g., **Lyleen**).
Place them near farming plots.
Provide seeds and fertilizer; harvest crops regularly.

guides.title: Pals for Cooling & Heating
guides.trigger: Player wants Pals to regulate base temperature

steps.instruction: Capture **Frostallion**, **Cryolinx** or **Reptyro Cyst** for cooling duties.
Assign them to cooling stations or base areas that overheat.
Use heat-producing Pals (like **Blazamut**) in cold areas for warmth.

guides.title: Pals for Electricity Generation
guides.trigger: Player needs power generation

steps.instruction: Capture **Orserk**, **Relaxaurus Lux** or **Grizzbolt**.
Assign them to generators or electric equipment.
Manage their energy output and provide rest breaks.

guides.title: Passive Skills Explained
guides.trigger: Player asks about passive skill categories

steps.instruction: Each Pal has up to four passive skills, such as **Legend**, **Lucky** or **Artisan**.
Passive skills enhance stats or provide unique benefits (e.g., increasing work speed).
Breed or catch Pals to obtain desirable passives; combine them through chain breeding.

guides.title: Active & Partner Skills Explained
guides.trigger: When players want to understand Pal skills

steps.instruction: **Active skills** are combat moves used when Pals are in battle.
**Partner skills** are triggered when Pals accompany you in the overworld (e.g., Jetragon’s fast flight).
Switch Pals to access different partner skills based on the situation.

guides.title: How to Increase Pal Affinity & Trust
guides.source_heading: How to Increase Pal Affinity & Trust
guides.trigger: Player asks how to improve bond with Pals

steps.instruction: Feed your Pals regularly and ensure they are rested.
Avoid overworking them or letting their SAN drop.
Interact with them (petting) and fight alongside them to build trust.

guides.title: Pal Morale & Sanity
guides.trigger: Player wants to prevent overwork or insanity

steps.instruction: Monitor each Pal’s SAN bar; low SAN results in reduced efficiency or refusal to work.
Provide **beds and play items** to restore SAN.
Rotate tasks and avoid leaving Pals unattended for too long.

guides.title: Pal Skins & Cosmetics
guides.trigger: Questions about different skins and how to unlock them

steps.instruction: Obtain skins through events, raids or the item shop.
Access your Pal’s **appearance menu** via the Palbox or inventory.
Apply the skin to change your Pal’s appearance.

guides.title: Pal Gear & Equipment
guides.trigger: Player needs to equip harnesses or saddles

steps.instruction: Unlock Pal gear such as saddles or harnesses in the tech tree.
Craft the gear with required materials.
Equip your Pal to enable riding, gliding or enhanced abilities.

guides.title: Element Swap & Subspecies
guides.trigger: When players ask about changing element or obtaining subspecies

steps.instruction: Collect special items (Element Swap Stone) from raids or missions.
Use the item on a Pal to change its element.
Breed specific pairs to obtain subspecies with alternate typings.

guides.title: Evolving & Leveling Up Pals
guides.trigger: Player wants to improve Pal stats quickly

steps.instruction: Gain experience for Pals by defeating enemies or completing tasks.
Use **experience candies or books** to speed up leveling.
While Palworld does not have Pokémon-style evolutions, some Pals have **subspecies** accessible via breeding.

guides.title: Pal Stat Distribution & IVs
guides.trigger: Questions about IVs and how to check them

steps.instruction: Use an **IV checker** or the Pal IV Stat Calculator to view hidden stats.
Breed Pals with high IVs to produce stronger offspring.
Focus on HP, ATK and DEF for combat Pals; Work Speed for base Pals.

guides.title: Capturing Pals Without Damage
guides.trigger: Player wants non-lethal capture methods

steps.instruction: Use **nets or traps** to capture weaker Pals without injuring them.
Toss a Pal Sphere from stealth for a higher success rate.
Avoid attacking the Pal; patience may be necessary.

guides.title: Unlocking the Breeding Farm
guides.trigger: Player asks how to start breeding

steps.instruction: Reach **technology level 19** and unlock the Breeding Farm.
Collect wood, stone and Paldium fragments to build the farm.
Place the farm within your base.

guides.title: Making Cake & Feeding Pals
guides.trigger: Player needs to craft cake to breed Pals

steps.instruction: Gather **flour, berries, milk, eggs and honey**.
Combine the ingredients at a cooking station to bake **cake**.
Place cake in the Breeding Farm’s inventory to encourage Pals to mate.

guides.title: Basic Breeding Mechanics
guides.trigger: Player asks how breeding works or stat inheritance

steps.instruction: Place one **male** and one **female** Pal in the Breeding Farm.
Provide cake and wait about **five minutes** for an egg to appear.
Eggs inherit the average breeding power of the parents.

guides.title: Breeding for Passive Skills
guides.trigger: Triggered when players want to pass Legend or Lucky skills

steps.instruction: Capture or breed Pals with rare passives (Legend, Lucky, Artisan).
Pair Pals so that desirable passives are present in both parents.
Hatch eggs; check offspring for inherited passives and repeat if necessary.

guides.title: Best Breeding Combos for Top Pals
guides.source_heading: Best Breeding Combos for Top Pals
guides.trigger: Player needs combinations for strong offspring

steps.instruction: Use recommended combinations like **Relaxaurus + Sparkit → Relaxaurus Lux** or **Lyleen + Menasting → Lyleen Noct**.
Breed the specified pairs and incubate the resulting eggs.
Raise the offspring; assign them to combat or support roles.

guides.title: Early-Game Breeding Combos
guides.trigger: Player seeks combos using common Pals

steps.instruction: Combine **Penking + Bushi** to produce **Anubis** for early DPS.
Use **Rushoar + Surfent** or **Swee + Sweepa** to get **Digtoise**.
Breed **Nitewing + Cinnamoth** to obtain **Sibelyx**.

guides.title: Breeding Combos by Role: Work Pals
guides.source_heading: Breeding Combos by Role: Work Pals
guides.trigger: When players ask for base-worker combos

steps.instruction: Breed **Penking + Penking** for Penking with the **Artisan** passive.
Breed **Penking + Wumpo Botan** for random work passives.
Repeat until you get desired passives and assign the offspring to your base.

guides.title: Breeding Combos by Role: Combat DPS Pals
guides.source_heading: Breeding Combos by Role: Combat DPS
guides.trigger: Player wants to breed DPS Pals

steps.instruction: Breed **Relaxaurus + Sparkit** for **Relaxaurus Lux**.
Breed **Incineram + Maraith** for **Incineram Noct**.
Breed **Frostallion + Anubis** for **Bastigor**.

guides.title: Breeding Combos by Role: Defense/Tank Pals
guides.trigger: When players need tanks or defenders

steps.instruction: Combine **Lamball + Fielfox** to create **Digtoise Terra**.
Breed **Mammorest + Wumpo** for **Mammorest Cryst**.
Pair **Lyleen + Menasting** for **Lyleen Noct** as a healer-tank hybrid.

guides.title: Breeding Combos by Role: Mobility/Utility Pals
guides.trigger: Player asks for mounts or utility Pals

steps.instruction: Breed **Elphidran + Surfent Aqua** for **Elphidran Aqua** (flying water mount).
Pair **Eikthyrdeer + Hangyu** for **Eikthyrdeer Terra**.
Combine **Surfent + Dumud** for **Surfent Terra**.

guides.title: Breeding Combos by Role: Support/Healing Pals
guides.trigger: When players want healers or support Pals

steps.instruction: Breed **Lyleen + Menasting** again for **Lyleen Noct** (healer/support).
Pair **Mau + Pengullet** for **Mau Cryst** (budget healer).
Breed **Dinossom + Rayhound** for **Dinossom Lux** (speed buff support).

guides.title: Hatching Eggs & Using Incubators
guides.trigger: Player asks about egg incubation times

steps.instruction: Collect eggs from the Breeding Farm or in the wild.
Place them in a standard incubator or **Electric Incubator** to reduce hatching time.
Monitor temperature and wait for the incubation timer to finish.

guides.title: Obtaining Alpha Eggs & Huge Eggs
guides.trigger: When players want Alpha or subspecies eggs

steps.instruction: Breed high-level Pals; there is about a **5 % chance** to produce a Huge/Alpha Egg.
Collect eggs from raid bosses or treasure chests for guaranteed Alpha eggs.
Use an Electric Incubator for efficient hatching.

guides.title: Breeding Cross-Species & Subspecies
guides.trigger: Questions about cross-breeding for special Pals

steps.instruction: Pair two Pals from different species as outlined in breeding charts.
Provide cake and wait for the resulting hybrid egg.
Hatch the egg to obtain a subspecies with mixed elements or unique traits.

guides.title: Passive Skill Probability & Inheritance
guides.trigger: Player asks about the chances of passives transferring

steps.instruction: Understand that 40 % of offspring get one passive, 30 % get two, 20 % get three and 10 % get four.
Breed Pals with multiple passives to increase the number of inherited skills.
Repeat breeding cycles until you obtain the desired combination.

guides.title: Breeding Farm Efficiency Tips
guides.trigger: When players want to speed up breeding or reduce wait time

steps.instruction: Use **Electric Incubators** to reduce wait time by 1.5×.
Always supply cake to keep Pals breeding continuously.
Maintain multiple breeding farms for parallel breeding projects.

guides.title: Interactive Map Overview
guides.trigger: Player wants to see map or markers for chests/effigies

steps.instruction: Access the official or community-made interactive map through a browser.
Enable or disable markers for Pals, effigies, chests and dungeons.
Plan your route by setting waypoints and referencing coordinates.

guides.title: All Alpha Pal Locations
guides.trigger: When players ask where to find Alpha Pals

steps.instruction: Select the **Alpha Pals** filter on the interactive map.
Travel to the indicated coordinates with an experienced team.
Defeat or capture the Alpha Pals using high-tier spheres.

guides.title: Dungeon Guide: Hillside Cavern
guides.trigger: Player wants to clear Hillside Cavern

steps.instruction: Locate the entrance in a low-level region.
Bring a torch or light source; the cavern is dark.
Defeat mobs inside and loot the final chest at the deepest chamber.

guides.title: Dungeon Guide: Mountain Stream Grotto
guides.trigger: Questions about low-level dungeon

steps.instruction: Travel to the grotto entrance near a river.
Prepare for water-type enemies.
Explore the winding tunnels and defeat the final mini-boss for loot.

guides.title: Dungeon Guide: Isolated Island Cavern
guides.trigger: Player needs to explore island cave

steps.instruction: Reach the island via glider or boat.
Enter the cavern; expect stronger enemies than on the mainland.
Collect unique materials and a treasure chest at the end.

guides.title: Dungeon Guide: Ravine Grotto
guides.trigger: When players ask about ravine dungeon

steps.instruction: Find the ravine entrance in mountainous terrain.
Use grappling hooks or gliders to traverse vertical passages.
Defeat the Alpha Pal inside and claim the rare items.

guides.title: Dungeon Guide: Cavern of the Dunes
guides.source_heading: Dungeon Guide: Cavern of the Dunes
guides.trigger: Exploring desert dungeon

steps.instruction: Travel to the desert region; locate the cavern entrance.
Equip heat-resistant gear and bring water.
Defeat sand-type monsters and avoid traps.

guides.title: Dungeon Guide: Frozen Abyss
guides.trigger: Player asks about tundra/ice dungeon

steps.instruction: Wear warm clothing to resist cold.
Navigate icy platforms and slippery slopes.
Defeat the Ice-type boss and loot its chest for Frost items.

guides.title: Dungeon Guide: Astral Mountain Ruins
guides.trigger: When players explore the Astral Mountains

steps.instruction: Ascend the Astral Mountains to reach ancient ruins.
Fight celestial-type enemies and solve simple puzzles.
Open the final chest containing high-level schematics.

guides.title: Dungeon Guide: Ocean Depths
guides.trigger: Player wants underwater dungeon tips

steps.instruction: Craft an underwater breathing device or ride an aquatic Pal.
Dive into the depths to find the dungeon entrance.
Defeat aquatic monsters and harvest unique materials.

guides.title: Map: Effigies & Totems Locations
guides.trigger: Player asks about upgrading skill points

steps.instruction: Use the interactive map to find all **effigies**.
Collect them to increase your maximum skill points.
Activate totems to gain buffs or unlock hidden areas.

guides.title: Map: Treasure Chests & Lockboxes
guides.trigger: When players ask for chest locations

steps.instruction: Enable chest markers on the interactive map.
Use lockpicking tools to open locked chests.
Collect schematics, materials and coins from each chest.

guides.title: Map: Egg & Breeding Locations
guides.trigger: Player asks where to find eggs

steps.instruction: Search for egg markers on the interactive map.
Visit nests or cave locations to collect eggs.
Some eggs only appear during specific weather or times; be patient.

guides.title: Map: Meteorite & Supply Drop Locations
guides.trigger: When players want to farm event items

steps.instruction: Monitor notifications for falling meteorites or supply drops.
Check the map for their landing sites.
Rush to the spot, defeat surrounding mobs and collect the loot.

guides.title: Weather & Biomes Explained
guides.trigger: Player asks how weather affects exploration

steps.instruction: Understand that different biomes (desert, tundra, volcanic, forest) have unique temperatures and hazards.
Equip appropriate gear before entering a biome.
Adjust your base’s position or use Pals to mitigate weather effects.

guides.title: Traversal Tips: Climbing, Gliding, Swimming
guides.trigger: Questions about mobility skills

steps.instruction: Use the glider to cross gaps or descend safely.
Climb vines or rocky surfaces with the jump and grab controls.
Ride aquatic Pals to swim quickly across water bodies.

guides.title: Secrets & Hidden Areas
guides.trigger: Player wants to find hidden caves or easter eggs

steps.instruction: Explore corners of the map often; look for unusual rock formations or structures.
Use bombs or explosives to blow open cracked walls.
Keep note of suspicious locations and return after gaining new abilities.

guides.title: Sanctuary & Wildlife Reserve Guide
guides.trigger: When players ask about wildlife sanctuaries or safe zones

steps.instruction: Travel to wildlife sanctuaries marked on the map.
Capture or observe rare Pals in a non-hostile environment.
Respect sanctuary rules; some areas restrict combat or capture.

guides.title: Fast Travel Network Guide
guides.trigger: Player needs to use or unlock fast travel points

steps.instruction: Activate every Great Eagle Statue you encounter.
Use fast travel to move quickly across the map.
Build small outposts near statues for convenience.

guides.title: Collecting Journals & Lore Entries
guides.trigger: Questions about story or lore items

steps.instruction: Search abandoned camps and ruins for glowing books or tablets.
Interact with them to collect the journal entry.
Read entries in your log to learn more about Palworld’s story.

guides.title: Tides of Terraria Content Overview
guides.trigger: Player asks what’s included in the Terraria collaboration

steps.instruction: Update your game to the **Tides of Terraria** version.
Access new islands and dungeons introduced in the collaboration.
Hunt Terraria-themed Pals and items (Herbil, Icelyn, etc.).

guides.title: Tides of Terraria: New Pals
guides.trigger: Questions about Herbil, Icelyn, Frostplume and other new Pals

steps.instruction: Travel to the Tides of Terraria islands.
Capture or breed new Pals such as **Herbil** and **Icelyn**.
Study their work suitability and incorporate them into your base.

guides.title: Tides of Terraria: How to Get Terraria Items
guides.source_heading: Tides of Terraria: How to Get Terraria Items
guides.trigger: Player wants to obtain Terraria crossover items

steps.instruction: Defeat Terraria bosses or complete missions on the new islands.
Collect drops that reference Terraria items (swords, wings, etc.).
Use or equip these items to gain unique abilities.

guides.title: How to Recruit Zoe (Terraria NPC)
guides.trigger: When players ask about recruiting the NPC Zoe

steps.instruction: Locate Zoe on the Tides of Terraria island.
Complete her quests or meet her requirements.
Recruit her to unlock new services or items.

guides.title: Tides of Terraria Dungeon Guide
guides.trigger: Player seeks info on Terraria dungeons

steps.instruction: Enter the Terraria dungeon and fight through themed enemies.
Avoid traps unique to Terraria (e.g., spike balls).
Defeat **Moon Lord** at the end and collect loot.

guides.title: Feybreak Update Overview & Release Date
guides.trigger: Player wants details on Feybreak update

steps.instruction: Ensure you have downloaded the **Feybreak** update.
Read patch notes to learn about new features and Pals (e.g., Xenolord Raid).
Visit new locations such as the Oil Rig stronghold.

guides.title: Feybreak Oil Rig Guide
guides.trigger: When players ask about oil rig stronghold

steps.instruction: Travel to the oil rig’s coordinates.
Defeat guards and navigate the multi-level platform.
Secure the rig and collect resources or kill the raid boss.

guides.title: Messenger of Love Locations
guides.trigger: Player asks about special messenger event

steps.instruction: Receive the mission to find the Messenger of Love NPC.
Travel to the indicated coordinates; the messenger may move between locations.
Complete tasks given by the messenger to receive rewards.

guides.title: Level 30 Oil Rig Strategy
guides.trigger: When players tackle the Level 30 oil rig

steps.instruction: Ensure your team is at least level 30.
Equip high-tier weapons and armor.
Coordinate with a group to clear out waves of enemies and defeat the boss.

guides.title: All Predator Pal Locations
guides.trigger: Players ask where predator Pals appear

steps.instruction: Identify predator Pals like **Warsect** or **Necromus**.
Use the map to locate their roaming zones.
Approach carefully; capture or defeat them for unique rewards.

guides.title: Sakurajima Summer Update Features
guides.trigger: Questions about new content from summer update

steps.instruction: Read the patch notes to understand new features: PVP arena, Lockpicking Tool v3, dog coins and more.
Explore Sakurajima island to discover new dungeons and Pals.
Participate in new events to earn exclusive skins and items.

guides.title: PVP Arena Guide
guides.trigger: Player asks about PVP arena and how to start

steps.instruction: Travel to the PVP arena on Sakurajima island.
Register for matches and choose your ruleset.
Fight other players; adapt strategies based on their Pals and playstyles.

guides.title: Meteorite Event Guide
guides.trigger: When players want to find meteor events

steps.instruction: Watch for meteor showers; they occur randomly after the update.
Follow the event marker to the crash site.
Defeat enemies around the meteor and mine the ore inside.

guides.title: Dog Coin Farming Guide
guides.trigger: Player asks how to farm Dog Coins

steps.instruction: Complete Sakurajima side quests that reward Dog Coins.
Defeat special enemies or open dog coin chests.
Spend Dog Coins on unique items or save them for later updates.

guides.title: Supply Drop Guide & Items
guides.trigger: Questions about supply drop mechanics

steps.instruction: Locate the falling supply crate via map markers.
Clear out surrounding enemies and open the crate.
Collect items such as ammo, tech manuals and rare resources.

guides.title: Halloween Skins & How to Change Pal Skins
guides.source_heading: Halloween Skins & How to Change Pal Skins
guides.trigger: When players ask about seasonal skins

steps.instruction: Participate in Halloween events to earn limited skins.
Access the skin menu for your Pal via the Palbox.
Apply the new skin; some skins may also change partner skills.

guides.title: Seasonal Festival Events & Rewards
guides.trigger: Player needs info on limited-time events

steps.instruction: Check event schedules from official announcements.
Participate in time-limited quests or mini-games.
Earn event currencies and trade them for festive items.

guides.title: Setting Up Multiplayer & Co-op
guides.trigger: Player asks how to play with friends

steps.instruction: From the main menu, select **multiplayer** and choose to host or join a world.
Share your world code with friends or input theirs.
Collaborate on building, exploring and fighting bosses.

guides.title: Running a Dedicated Server
guides.trigger: Questions about hosting private servers

steps.instruction: Install the dedicated server software from the official site or Steam.
Configure server settings (player cap, difficulty, world seed).
Launch the server and invite players to join via IP address.

guides.title: Trading Pals & Items with Others
guides.trigger: When players ask about trades and exchanges

steps.instruction: Approach another player and open the trade interface.
Select Pals or items to offer; confirm trade terms.
Complete the trade; transferred Pals retain their levels and passives.

guides.title: Joining the PVP Arena
guides.trigger: Player wants to battle others

steps.instruction: Travel to a PVP arena location and speak with the arena NPC.
Choose a match type (1v1, 3v3, etc.).
Equip your Pals and gear; fight until one team is defeated.

guides.title: PVP Etiquette & Rules
guides.trigger: Questions about PVP rules and sportsmanship

steps.instruction: Respect match rules (no healing items if prohibited).
Avoid exploiting glitches or unfair mechanics.
Congratulate opponents and maintain sportsmanship.

guides.title: Clan & Guild System
guides.trigger: If players ask about joining or creating guilds

steps.instruction: Create a guild via the guild board at a major settlement.
Invite friends or players to join.
Complete guild quests to earn shared resources and perks.

guides.title: Raid Party Coordination
guides.trigger: Player needs tips for organizing raid parties

steps.instruction: Form a group of players with complementary Pals and roles.
Designate a leader to call out mechanics and phases.
Distribute loot fairly after defeating the raid boss.

guides.title: Cross-Platform Play & Compatibility
guides.trigger: Questions about playing across platforms

steps.instruction: Check whether your version supports cross-play.
Add friends via cross-platform friend codes.
Join each other’s games by inputting the provided codes.

guides.title: Voice & Chat Communication Tips
guides.trigger: When players ask about communicating in-game

steps.instruction: Use an external voice chat program (e.g., Discord) or the in-game voice chat.
Communicate boss mechanics and resource needs clearly.
Respect other players’ privacy and follow community guidelines.

guides.title: Understanding HP, ATK & DEF
guides.trigger: Player asks about basic stats

steps.instruction: **HP** determines how much damage you or your Pal can take before fainting.
**ATK** affects physical and elemental damage output.
**DEF** reduces incoming damage; increase via leveling, gear and passives.

guides.title: Work Speed Explained
guides.trigger: Questions about work speed and productivity

steps.instruction: Work Speed influences how quickly a Pal completes assigned tasks.
High Work Speed Pals (e.g., Penking) finish jobs faster.
Breed or capture Pals with the **Artisan** passive to boost work speed.

guides.title: Stamina & Weight Systems
guides.trigger: Player asks why they can’t run or carry more

steps.instruction: **Stamina** governs sprinting, dodging and climbing; increase it when leveling up.
**Weight** is the amount of gear and materials you can carry; upgrade the stat or use Pals to transport goods.
Overloading weight slows movement; drop items or use storage.

guides.title: Rarity & Pal Star Ratings
guides.trigger: When players ask about pal rarity tiers

steps.instruction: Pals have rarity levels (common to legendary) indicated by stars.
Higher rarity Pals often have better base stats and unique passives.
Capture rare Pals in difficult regions or via breeding subspecies.

guides.title: Sicknesses & Injuries
guides.trigger: Questions about illness and how to cure Pals

steps.instruction: Pals can become sick or injured if overworked, starved or damaged.
Craft medicine or visit a healer NPC to cure them.
Provide rest and food to prevent illness.

guides.title: SAN (Sanity) System
guides.trigger: Player asks about Pal mental health

steps.instruction: Each Pal has a SAN (sanity) meter; low SAN leads to tantrums or refusal to work.
Keep Pals happy with rest, varied tasks and comfortable base conditions.
Use special items or activities to restore SAN.

guides.title: Weather Effects on Players & Pals
guides.trigger: When players want to know how weather affects them

steps.instruction: Extreme cold causes frostbite; extreme heat causes heatstroke.
Wear appropriate armor and bring temperature-regulating Pals to mitigate effects.
Build shelters in hazardous biomes to protect Pals.

guides.title: Passive Skill Ranks & Categories
guides.trigger: Player needs to understand Legend, Lucky, etc.

steps.instruction: Passives range from common to **Legend** (highest tier).
Each passive affects specific stats or work efficiency (e.g., **Lucky** increases drop rates).
Breed Pals or use skill fruits to obtain high-rank passives.

guides.title: Damage Types & Resistances
guides.trigger: Questions about physical vs elemental damage

steps.instruction: Physical and elemental damage types interact with Pal resistances.
Match your attacks to enemy weaknesses (e.g., Water vs Fire).
Equip gear that reduces damage from the enemy’s dominant element.

guides.title: Experience & Leveling Mechanics
guides.trigger: Player asks how EXP works for players or Pals

steps.instruction: Gain experience by defeating enemies, completing missions and crafting items.
Pals gain experience even when assigned to base tasks.
When leveling up, allocate stat points to suit your playstyle.

guides.title: Resource Respawn & Timers
guides.trigger: When players wonder when resources respawn

steps.instruction: Trees, ore nodes and berry bushes respawn after an in-game day or more.
Rare resources take longer to respawn; plan resource runs accordingly.
Dungeons reset after a set period, allowing you to re-farm them.

guides.title: Vendor & Merchant Mechanics
guides.trigger: Questions about how vendor stock refreshes

steps.instruction: Vendors restock their inventory after a daily reset or when you leave the area.
Black Marketeers sell rare items but may charge more.
Buying and selling prices vary depending on your negotiation skill or passives.

guides.title: Crafting Queue & Work Prioritization
guides.trigger: Player wants to know how tasks are prioritized

steps.instruction: Pals will tackle the top item in a crafting queue first.
Assign high Work Speed Pals to time-sensitive tasks.
Reorder tasks manually if certain items are needed urgently.

guides.title: Achievement & Trophy Guide
guides.trigger: Player asks how to unlock achievements

steps.instruction: View achievements in your profile menu.
Complete specific tasks (e.g., capture 50 Pals, defeat all tower bosses).
Collect rewards or recognition for 100 % completion.

guides.title: Settings & Accessibility Options
guides.trigger: When players need help adjusting settings

steps.instruction: Navigate to the options menu from the pause screen.
Adjust controls, sound, display and accessibility features (colorblind modes, subtitles).
Save settings to apply changes.

guides.title: Saving & Auto-Save System
guides.trigger: Player asks how saving works

steps.instruction: The game auto-saves at regular intervals and after key events.
Manually save by interacting with your bed or Palbox.
Back up save files to avoid data loss.

guides.title: Joining Events & Festivals
guides.trigger: Player asks about community events

steps.instruction: Monitor in-game announcements and social channels for event schedules.
Travel to the event location or speak with the event NPC.
Participate in mini-games and complete tasks to earn rewards.

guides.title: Participating in Community Challenges
guides.trigger: When players want to join special challenges

steps.instruction: Join official or fan-run challenges through forums or social media.
Complete the specified goals (e.g., build a castle, breed a rare Pal).
Submit proof to organizers and earn recognition or prizes.

guides.title: Reporting Bugs & Feedback
guides.trigger: Player needs to report a bug or provide feedback

steps.instruction: Collect screenshots or videos of the issue.
Visit the official support site or email the developers.
Describe the bug with steps to reproduce and your system information.

guides.title: Modding & Custom Content
guides.trigger: Questions about mods or custom assets

steps.instruction: Check the game’s terms of service to ensure modding is allowed.
Download mods from trusted sources.
Install according to instructions; backup files beforehand.

guides.title: Content Creators & Streaming
guides.trigger: When players want tips for streaming Palworld

steps.instruction: Use streaming software (OBS, Streamlabs) to capture your gameplay.
Engage your audience by explaining mechanics and sharing tips.
Follow platform guidelines for monetization and community behavior.

guides.title: Role-Playing & Storytelling
guides.trigger: Player asks about role-play opportunities

steps.instruction: Create a backstory for your character and Pals.
Build themed bases and set personal goals (e.g., conservationist, trader).
Join RP communities to share stories.

guides.title: Sharing Builds & Base Tours
guides.trigger: When players want to showcase their bases

steps.instruction: Capture screenshots or record video of your base.
Upload to social media or community forums.
Provide build details, resources used and design inspiration.

guides.title: Accessibility: Colorblind & Control Options
guides.trigger: Questions about accessible features

steps.instruction: Open the settings menu and enable **colorblind mode** if needed.
Remap control inputs to suit your playstyle or hardware.
Adjust font sizes and contrast for easier reading.

guides.title: Parental Controls & Safe Play
guides.trigger: Player asks about safe play for kids

steps.instruction: Use console or PC parental controls to limit play time.
Disable multiplayer features if necessary.
Monitor younger players’ interactions and ensure they play in safe environments.
